channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Australia news live: three states braces for extreme heat; remains of missing snorkeller wash ashore on WA beach
item.description: Temperatures to soar well into the 40s in nation’s south-east. Follow today’s news live Get our breaking news email , free app or daily news podcast W...

item.title: UK and France ‘ready to deploy troops’ to Ukraine after ceasefire
item.description: Trilateral declaration of intent signed after ‘coalition of the willing’ summit in Paris with plan to establish military hubs Britain and France have ...

item.title: Dozens of January 6 supporters march through Washington five years after attack; brawl erupts as counter-protester is arrested – live
item.description: Many of those at today’s march, including ex-Proud Boy leader Enrique Tarrio say that they were there to protest against the death of Ashli Babbitt, a...

item.title: UK and France agree to deploy forces to Ukraine in the event of a peace deal – as it happened
item.description: Starmer and Macron ‘sign declaration of intent’ following Paris meeting Their statement also says they “will not stop defending” the UN Charter princi...

item.title: West Midlands police insist decision to ban Maccabi fans ‘not politically influenced’
item.description: Police leaders defend position after being recalled to give further evidence in second hearing to home affairs committee Police chiefs facing scrutiny...

item.title: US may intercept and seize oil tanker sailing near UK, reports say
item.description: US officials have a warrant to seize the Russian-flagged ship accused of breaking sanctions.

item.title: Fresh snow and ice warnings as Storm Goretti approaches UK
item.description: Hundreds of schools have been closed due to the snow and cold temperatures.

item.title: 'A moving moment' as Rosenior breaks barriers
item.description: Liam Rosenior's appointment as Chelsea manager is a "massive moment" for representation in the Premier League.

item.title: No conspiracy over Israeli football fans ban, West Midlands Police say
item.description: Senior police officers reiterate banning Israeli fans from the Villa game was "based on safety".

item.title: Learner drivers may face mandatory six-month gap between theory and practical tests
item.description: A minimum learning period of up to six months could be introduced for learner drivers
